Sex : 男性 Race : African American Clas : Legionary
Sex : 男性 Race : Caucasian Clas : Legionary

ESP.ORIGINAL: Halt! This is Imperium Radio, restricted to Legion personnel only. State your business.
ESP.TRADUIT: 停下！这里是帝国广播电台，仅限军团人员进入，说明你的来意。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Imperium Radio Guard [0100488E] (mod) Quest : ([0100488C]00legionradioguardconvo) 0100488C (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\LegionRadio.esp\00legionradioguardvoice\00legionra_GREETING_0000488D_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Speak to Cypher if you have business here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你在这里有事，请找赛弗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Imperium Radio Guard [0100488E] (mod) Quest : ([0100488C]00legionradioguardconvo) 0100488C (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\LegionRadio.esp\00legionradioguardvoice\00legionra_GREETING_00005A0E_1.wav

NPC : Imperium Radio Guard [0100488E] (mod) Quest : ([0100488C]00legionradioguardconvo) 0100488C (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\LegionRadio.esp\00legionradioguardvoice\00legionra_GREETING_00005A0F_1.wav
NPC : Cypher [01004881] (mod) Quest : ([010056F5]00cypherdialogue) 010056F5 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\LegionRadio.esp\00cyphervoice\00cypherdialogue_GREETING_000056F6_1.wav
NPC : Cypher [01004881] (mod) Quest : ([010056F5]00cypherdialogue) 010056F5 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\LegionRadio.esp\00cyphervoice\00cypherdialogue_GREETING_00005712_1.wav
NPC : Cypher [01004881] (mod) Quest : ([010056F5]00cypherdialogue) 010056F5 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\LegionRadio.esp\00cyphervoice\00cypherdialogue_Attack_00006598_1.wav
NPC : Cypher [01004881] (mod) Quest : ([010056F5]00cypherdialogue) 010056F5 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\LegionRadio.esp\00cyphervoice\00cypherdialogue_Attack_0000659B_1.wav
NPC : Cypher [01004881] (mod) Quest : ([010056F5]00cypherdialogue) 010056F5 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\LegionRadio.esp\00cyphervoice\00cypherdialogue_Hit_00006597_1.wav
NPC : Cypher [01004881] (mod) Quest : ([010056F5]00cypherdialogue) 010056F5 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\LegionRadio.esp\00cyphervoice\00cypherdialogue_Murder_00006599_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Welcome, loyal subjects of Caesar, to the voice of the Imperium! You're tuned in to Imperium Radio.
ESP.TRADUIT: 欢迎凯撒的忠实子民们收听帝国之声，你现在收听的是帝国电台。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Legion Radio Operator [010027C1] (mod) Quest : ([01000AE5]00legionradioquest) Imperium Radio EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\LegionRadio.esp\00legionradiovoice\00legionra_RadioHello_00000AE8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're listening to Imperium Radio, where the will of Mars echoes across the wasteland.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你正在收听的是帝国电台，战神的意志在废土上回荡。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Legion Radio Operator [010027C1] (mod) Quest : ([01000AE5]00legionradioquest) Imperium Radio EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\LegionRadio.esp\00legionradiovoice\00legionra_RadioHello_00000AEA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Join us as we march towards victory under the banner of Caesar! This is Imperium Radio.
ESP.TRADUIT: 加入我们，在凯撒的旗帜下走向胜利！这里是帝国电台。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Legion Radio Operator [010027C1] (mod) Quest : ([01000AE5]00legionradioquest) Imperium Radio EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\LegionRadio.esp\00legionradiovoice\00legionra_RadioHello_00000AEC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hear the drums of war and the voice of our great leader! This is Imperium Radio, broadcasting the will of Caesar.
ESP.TRADUIT: 聆听战鼓和伟大领袖的声音！这里是帝国电台，播报凯撒的旨意。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Legion Radio Operator [010027C1] (mod) Quest : ([01000AE5]00legionradioquest) Imperium Radio EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\LegionRadio.esp\00legionradiovoice\00legionra_RadioHello_00000AEE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're listening to the voice of the Legion on Imperium Radio!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你正在收听的是帝国电台的军团之声！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Legion Radio Operator [010027C1] (mod) Quest : ([01000AE5]00legionradioquest) Imperium Radio EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\LegionRadio.esp\00legionradiovoice\00legionra_RadioHello_000024CC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What would you have me do?

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01000AE5]00legionradioquest) Imperium Radio EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Very well. You may proceed. However, be warned. Aggressive acts will earn you a place on a cross.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，你可以进入了。但是，请注意。过激行为会让你被钉上十字架。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Imperium Radio Guard [0100488E] (mod) Quest : ([0100488C]00legionradioguardconvo) 0100488C (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\LegionRadio.esp\00legionradioguardvoice\00legionra_00legionradiogu_00004893_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Legion Rep] Be calm. I am a friend of the Legion.
ESP.TRADUIT: [军团声望]放轻松，我是军团的朋友之一。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Forgive my challenge. You may proceed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请原谅我的挑衅。你可以进入了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Imperium Radio Guard [0100488E] (mod) Quest : ([0100488C]00legionradioguardconvo) 0100488C (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\LegionRadio.esp\00legionradioguardvoice\00legionra_00legionradiogu_00004895_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I bear the Mark of Caesar.
You won't even make it into the building.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你甚至都进不了这栋楼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Imperium Radio Guard [0100488E] (mod) Quest : ([0100488C]00legionradioguardconvo) 0100488C (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\LegionRadio.esp\00legionradioguardvoice\00legionra_00legionradiogu_00004897_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Attack] My business is to end you and your Legion propaganda.
ESP.TRADUIT: [攻击]我的任务就是终结你和你的军团政治宣传。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] Do you think I'm stupid? I'll have your head for wasting my time.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败]你以为我是傻瓜吗？因为你浪费了我的时间，我要砍了你的头。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Imperium Radio Guard [0100488E] (mod) Quest : ([0100488C]00legionradioguardconvo) 0100488C (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\LegionRadio.esp\00legionradioguardvoice\00legionra_00legionradiogu_0000489A_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have urgent business inside! Please let me in! The fate of the Legion depends on it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我到里面有急事！请让我进去！这关系到军团的命运。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] Very well. Get downstairs and speak to Centurion Cypher immediately.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]很好，你马上下楼去找赛弗百夫长。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Imperium Radio Guard [0100488E] (mod) Quest : ([0100488C]00legionradioguardconvo) 0100488C (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\LegionRadio.esp\00legionradioguardvoice\00legionra_00legionradiogu_0000489B_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Lie> I have a lead on NCR troop movements near Nipton for your radio station.
ESP.TRADUIT: <撒谎>我为你们的电台提供了一条尼普顿附近NCR动向的线索。

ESP.ORIGINAL: So it seems. What business have you here Amicus?
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来是的，朋友，你来这里有什么事？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cypher [01004881] (mod) Quest : ([010056F5]00cypherdialogue) 010056F5 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\LegionRadio.esp\00cyphervoice\00cypherdi_00cyphergreetin_000056F8_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Legion Reputation] Ave Centurion! I am a friend of the Legion.
ESP.TRADUIT: [军团声望]你好，百夫长！我是军团的朋友。

ESP.ORIGINAL: A traveler? You are in restricted Legion territory. I suggest you travel elsewhere.
ESP.TRADUIT: 旅行者？你在军团禁区内，我建议你去别的地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cypher [01004881] (mod) Quest : ([010056F5]00cypherdialogue) 010056F5 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\LegionRadio.esp\00cyphervoice\00cypherdi_00cyphergreetin_000056FF_1.wav

ESP.TRADUIT: 谁也不是，只是一个旅行者。

ESP.ORIGINAL: A courier? What brings you here profligate?
ESP.TRADUIT: 邮差？什么风把你这放荡者吹来了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cypher [01004881] (mod) Quest : ([010056F5]00cypherdialogue) 010056F5 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\LegionRadio.esp\00cyphervoice\00cypherdi_00cyphergreetin_000056FB_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm a courier with the Mojave Express.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是莫哈韦邮政公司的一名邮差。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah, you're THAT courier. No, I have not seen that degenerate around here. If I were you, I'd head to Vegas. No welp from that city leaves for long.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，你就是那个邮差。不，我在这附近没见过那个放荡者。如果我是你，我会去维加斯。那座城市的人不会离家太久的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cypher [01004881] (mod) Quest : ([010056F5]00cypherdialogue) 010056F5 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\LegionRadio.esp\00cyphervoice\00cypherdi_00cyphergreetin_000056FD_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: A man in a checkered suit shot me in the head. Have you seen him?
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个穿格子西装的人朝我脑袋开了一枪，你见过他吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Careful Profligate. I have put many wastelanders on a cross for much less a transgression.
ESP.TRADUIT: 小心点，放荡者，我已经把许多废土人送上了十字架，只因他们的小小过错。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cypher [01004881] (mod) Quest : ([010056F5]00cypherdialogue) 010056F5 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\LegionRadio.esp\00cyphervoice\00cypherdi_00cyphergreetin_00005701_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] So rare to find a comedian this far from that city of cowards. State your business profligate.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]离那个懦夫之城这么远，还能找到一个喜剧团演员，真是太难得了，说说你的事吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cypher [01004881] (mod) Quest : ([010056F5]00cypherdialogue) 010056F5 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\LegionRadio.esp\00cyphervoice\00cypherdi_00cyphergreetin_00005703_1.wav

ESP.TRADUIT: 别紧张，“大大 · 阳具”大人，我开玩笑的。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cypher [01004881] (mod) Quest : ([010056F5]00cypherdialogue) 010056F5 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\LegionRadio.esp\00cyphervoice\00cypherdi_00cyphergreetin_00005704_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's a hard life, full of endless training, battle, and bloodshed. But ultimately rewarding.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是一种艰苦的生活，充满了无休止的训练、战斗和血汗。但终究是有回报的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cypher [01004881] (mod) Quest : ([010056F5]00cypherdialogue) 010056F5 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\LegionRadio.esp\00cyphervoice\00cypherdi_00cypherlegionl_00005706_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: What is life in the Legion like?
ESP.TRADUIT: 军团里的生活是怎样的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: To harass and demoralize the profligates, why else?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为了骚扰那些放荡者，打击他们的士气，还能为了什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cypher [01004881] (mod) Quest : ([010056F5]00cypherdialogue) 010056F5 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\LegionRadio.esp\00cyphervoice\00cypherdi_00cypherwhyarey_00005709_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: It is by Caesar's will that I run this station. It's dual purpose. Imperium Radio acts as a slap in the face to the profligates.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是凯撒的旨意让我管理这个电台。它有双重目的，帝国电台是给那些放荡者的一记耳光。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cypher [01004881] (mod) Quest : ([010056F5]00cypherdialogue) 010056F5 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\LegionRadio.esp\00cyphervoice\00cypherdi_00cypherwhyarey_0000570B_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Demoralizing their troops via its blatant existence, while simultaneously boosting the morale and battle willingness of our own forces.
ESP.TRADUIT: 通过它的公然存在来打击他们部队的士气，同时提高我们军队的士气和战斗意志。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cypher [01004881] (mod) Quest : ([010056F5]00cypherdialogue) 010056F5 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\LegionRadio.esp\00cyphervoice\00cypherdi_00cypherwhyarey_0000570B_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: With our signal active, the Legion fights harder than ever before against the profligates. There will be no surrender, no retreat, no quarter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 随着我们信号的激活，军团将比以往任何时候都更加努力地打击那些放荡者。决不投降，决不撤退，决不退让。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cypher [01004881] (mod) Quest : ([010056F5]00cypherdialogue) 010056F5 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\LegionRadio.esp\00cyphervoice\00cypherdi_00cypherwhyarey_0000570B_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: They will be as a flood washing over the enemy, the likes of which not even Hoover Dam could retain.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们将像洪水一样冲刷敌人，甚至连胡佛大坝都无法阻挡这样的洪水。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cypher [01004881] (mod) Quest : ([010056F5]00cypherdialogue) 010056F5 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\LegionRadio.esp\00cyphervoice\00cypherdi_00cypherwhyarey_0000570B_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why run a radio station instead of fighting on the front lines?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么不在前线战斗，而要经营一家广播电台？

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cypher [01004881] (mod) Quest : ([010056F5]00cypherdialogue) 010056F5 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\LegionRadio.esp\00cyphervoice\00cypherdi_00cyphertransit_0000570D_1.wav
NPC : Cypher [01004881] (mod) Quest : ([010056F5]00cypherdialogue) 010056F5 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\LegionRadio.esp\00cyphervoice\00cypherdi_00cyphertransit_00005717_1.wav
NPC : Cypher [01004881] (mod) Quest : ([010056F5]00cypherdialogue) 010056F5 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\LegionRadio.esp\00cyphervoice\00cypherdi_00cyphertransit_00005A08_1.wav
NPC : Cypher [01004881] (mod) Quest : ([010056F5]00cypherdialogue) 010056F5 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\LegionRadio.esp\00cyphervoice\00cypherdi_00cyphertransit_00005A09_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Indeed it is. What you are witnessing is the armor of a Centurion, placed together with trophies collected from our numerous foes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 的确如此。你现在看到的是百夫长的盔甲，用无数敌人那里收集来的战利品打造在一起。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cypher [01004881] (mod) Quest : ([010056F5]00cypherdialogue) 010056F5 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\LegionRadio.esp\00cyphervoice\00cypherdi_00cypherarmor_0000570F_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Each patchwork is a reminder to the enemy of the might of the Legion, and the tenacity of our warriors.
ESP.TRADUIT: 每一块部件都在提醒敌人军团的强大和我们战士的顽强。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cypher [01004881] (mod) Quest : ([010056F5]00cypherdialogue) 010056F5 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\LegionRadio.esp\00cyphervoice\00cypherdi_00cypherarmor_0000570F_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: That is some armor you're wearing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你穿的这身盔甲真不错

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cypher [01004881] (mod) Quest : ([010056F5]00cypherdialogue) 010056F5 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\LegionRadio.esp\00cyphervoice\00cypherdi_00cyphergoodbye_00005711_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: When I was a boy, my tribe was absorbed by the Legion. We were set in our ways, content to live off scraps, stealing from those as desparate as us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当我还是个孩子的时候，我们的部落被军团吞并了。我们固步自封，满足于苟且偷生，从那些和我们一样绝望的人那里偷东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cypher [01004881] (mod) Quest : ([010056F5]00cypherdialogue) 010056F5 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\LegionRadio.esp\00cyphervoice\00cypherdi_00cypherwhatsyo_00005714_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: During that time, the Legion was actively embroiled in a war against a neighboring tribe. The Cyphers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在此期间，军团积极干预了一场与邻近部落，赛弗帮，的战争。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cypher [01004881] (mod) Quest : ([010056F5]00cypherdialogue) 010056F5 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\LegionRadio.esp\00cyphervoice\00cypherdi_00cypherwhatsyo_00005714_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: They must have needed more men because it wasn't long before Legion emissaries came to us with an ultimatum; join or be extinguished.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们肯定需要更多的人手，因为没过多久，军团使者就向我们发出了最后通牒：要么加入，要么被消灭。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cypher [01004881] (mod) Quest : ([010056F5]00cypherdialogue) 010056F5 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\LegionRadio.esp\00cyphervoice\00cypherdi_00cypherwhatsyo_00005714_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Having seen the brutality of Legion methods already, my tribe surrendered without contest. The cowards.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的部族已经见识过军团的残暴手段，因此不战而降。真是懦夫。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cypher [01004881] (mod) Quest : ([010056F5]00cypherdialogue) 010056F5 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\LegionRadio.esp\00cyphervoice\00cypherdi_00cypherwhatsyo_00005714_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: My new life began. I was just young enough to be accepted for Legion training. I thank Mars every day I wasn't born a year earlier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的新生活开始了。我的年龄刚刚够接受军团训练。我每天都在感谢战神，我没有早一年出生。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cypher [01004881] (mod) Quest : ([010056F5]00cypherdialogue) 010056F5 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\LegionRadio.esp\00cyphervoice\00cypherdi_00cypherwhatsyo_00005716_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: A short while into my training, the Cyphers managed to sneak a raiding party into our training camp.
ESP.TRADUIT: 训练刚开始没多久，赛弗帮的人就设法安排一支突击队偷偷溜进了我们的训练营。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cypher [01004881] (mod) Quest : ([010056F5]00cypherdialogue) 010056F5 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\LegionRadio.esp\00cyphervoice\00cypherdi_00cypherwhatsyo_00005716_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I guess they thought killing the less experienced of us would hinder the Legion's advance. They were sorely mistaken.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我猜他们以为杀死我们中战斗经验更少的人会阻碍军团前进。他们大错特错了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cypher [01004881] (mod) Quest : ([010056F5]00cypherdialogue) 010056F5 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\LegionRadio.esp\00cyphervoice\00cypherdi_00cypherwhatsyo_00005716_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Awakening to the chaos, my Legion training kicked in, or maybe it was just my youthful excitement.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在一片混乱中醒来，我的军团训练开始了，或许这只是我年轻时的兴奋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cypher [01004881] (mod) Quest : ([010056F5]00cypherdialogue) 010056F5 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\LegionRadio.esp\00cyphervoice\00cypherdi_00cypherwhatsyo_00005716_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Regardless, I jumped on the back of one of the tribals, clinging on for dear life while I tried to choke him unconscious.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎么说，我还是跳到了其中一个部落人的背上，死死地抓住他，试图把他掐晕。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cypher [01004881] (mod) Quest : ([010056F5]00cypherdialogue) 010056F5 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\LegionRadio.esp\00cyphervoice\00cypherdi_00cypherwhatsyo_00005716_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do not get the wrong impression profligate. Our armor may be rudimentary, but our warriors are far superior.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不要误以为我们是放荡者。我们的盔甲可能很简陋，但我们的战士远胜于他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cypher [01004881] (mod) Quest : ([010056F5]00cypherdialogue) 010056F5 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\LegionRadio.esp\00cyphervoice\00cypherdi_00cypherarmor2_00005719_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: All the guns in the world have yet to halt a Legion charge.
ESP.TRADUIT: 世界上所有的枪炮都无法阻止军团的冲锋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cypher [01004881] (mod) Quest : ([010056F5]00cypherdialogue) 010056F5 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\LegionRadio.esp\00cyphervoice\00cypherdi_00cypherarmor2_00005719_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: It certainly seems more protective than football pads.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，它看起来比橄榄球护具更具保护作用。

ESP.ORIGINAL: When my Centurion saw this he yelled something along to the effect of "A boy fights while men cower".
ESP.TRADUIT: 当我的百夫长看到这一幕时，他大喊了一句："那男孩在战斗，而男人们在畏缩"。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cypher [01004881] (mod) Quest : ([010056F5]00cypherdialogue) 010056F5 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\LegionRadio.esp\00cyphervoice\00cypherdi_00cypherwhatsyo_0000571B_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: This must have emasculated the recruits, as suddenly the training camp erupted as they rushed to meet the enemy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这肯定让新兵们感觉蒙羞，因为他们冲向了敌人，训练营随即就爆发战斗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE:
NPC : Cypher [01004881] (mod) Quest : ([010056F5]00cypherdialogue) 010056F5 (EDID)
Audio : \Sound\voice\LegionRadio.esp\00cyphervoice\00cypherdi_00cypherwhatsyo_0000571B_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Needless to say, the raiding party was massacred to the last man. I was rewarded with the name of Cypher in triumph of my bravery against the tribe.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不用说，突击队被屠杀殆尽。我因英勇抗击部落人而获得了"赛弗"的称号。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE:
NPC : Cypher [01004881] (mod) Quest : ([010056F5]00cypherdialogue) 010056F5 (EDID)
Audio : \Sound\voice\LegionRadio.esp\00cyphervoice\00cypherdi_00cypherwhatsyo_0000571B_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: A name I carry with pride to this day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个名字让我至今引以为豪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cypher [01004881] (mod) Quest : ([010056F5]00cypherdialogue) 010056F5 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\LegionRadio.esp\00cyphervoice\00cypherdi_00cypherwhatsyo_0000571B_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: It is just one moment of many where I brought the fight to the enemy. What else did you want to know?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这只是我众多记忆中血战敌人的的一段。你还想知道什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cypher [01004881] (mod) Quest : ([010056F5]00cypherdialogue) 010056F5 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\LegionRadio.esp\00cyphervoice\00cypherdi_00cypherwhatsyo_0000571D_1.wav

ESP.TRADUIT: 这真是一个令人惊叹的故事！

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cypher [01004881] (mod) Quest : ([010056F5]00cypherdialogue) 010056F5 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\LegionRadio.esp\00cyphervoice\00cypherdi_00cypherwhatsyo_0000571F_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Mock] You became a Centurion by acting foolishly? Sounds about right for the Legion.
ESP.TRADUIT: [嘲笑]你是靠愚蠢的行为成为百夫长的？听起来很符合军团作风。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why does your face follow your nose? It should be obvious, shouldn't it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么脸会跟着鼻子走？这不是很明显吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cypher [01004881] (mod) Quest : ([010056F5]00cypherdialogue) 010056F5 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\LegionRadio.esp\00cyphervoice\00cypherdi_00cyphercesar1_00005721_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I guess I shouldn't be surprised that a common degenerate is ignorant of his masters. Mars is the god of war.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不应该对一个普通的堕落者对他的主一无所知感到惊讶。战神即是火星的马尔斯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cypher [01004881] (mod) Quest : ([010056F5]00cypherdialogue) 010056F5 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\LegionRadio.esp\00cyphervoice\00cypherdi_00cyphercesar3_00005723_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was he that cleansed the world to wipe the slate clean. It was he that sent Caesar to form the Legion and bring civility back to the world.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是他净化了世界，让历史重归正轨。是他派遣凯撒组建军团，将文明带回这个世界。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cypher [01004881] (mod) Quest : ([010056F5]00cypherdialogue) 010056F5 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\LegionRadio.esp\00cyphervoice\00cypherdi_00cyphercesar3_00005723_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: it is he that guides us in our campaigns. We follow Caesar as we follow Mars, to victory.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是他指引我们征战。我们追随凯撒，就像追随战神，走向胜利。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cypher [01004881] (mod) Quest : ([010056F5]00cypherdialogue) 010056F5 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\LegionRadio.esp\00cyphervoice\00cypherdi_00cyphercesar3_00005723_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Watch your tongue wastrel, lest I have it removed. No one speaks ill of the son of Mars in my presence.
ESP.TRADUIT: 注意你的言辞，免得我把你的舌头拔掉。在我面前，谁也不许说战神之子的坏话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cypher [01004881] (mod) Quest : ([010056F5]00cypherdialogue) 010056F5 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\LegionRadio.esp\00cyphervoice\00cypherdi_00cyphercesar2_00005725_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Many have called Caesar a maniac. What do you think?
ESP.TRADUIT: 许多人称凯撒为疯子。你怎么看？

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cypher [01004881] (mod) Quest : ([010056F5]00cypherdialogue) 010056F5 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\LegionRadio.esp\00cyphervoice\00cypherdi_00cyphergrimrea_00005728_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: When you pass through the same lands that were once plagued by chemned up husks of human beings, only to see cities now flourishing...
ESP.TRADUIT: 当你经过那些曾经被人类的遗毒污染的土地时，却只会看见城市正在蓬勃发展...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cypher [01004881] (mod) Quest : ([010056F5]00cypherdialogue) 010056F5 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\LegionRadio.esp\00legionradiovoice\00cypherdi_00cypherlegionl_0000659D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: With fresh flowing water, electricity and bountiful crops all thanks to Legion justice, you grow to be grateful.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有了新鲜的流水、电力和丰收的庄稼，这一切都要归功于军团的正义，你会渐渐心存感激。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cypher [01004881] (mod) Quest : ([010056F5]00cypherdialogue) 010056F5 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\LegionRadio.esp\00cyphervoice\00cypherdi_00cypherlegionl_0000659D_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, ending the plague of degeneracy has its rewards.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，结束腐朽文明的堕落污染是有回报的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cypher [01004881] (mod) Quest : ([010056F5]00cypherdialogue) 010056F5 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\LegionRadio.esp\00cyphervoice\00cypherdi_00cypherlegionl_0000659D_3.wav
